Betsy Dupuis

Designer / Developer Hybrid

Hello,

I'm Betsy Dupuis. I'm a designer and front-end developer in Austin, TX.

My first introduction to design was through my love of photography, learning graphics editing, composition and layout, and art direction.

Regards,

Betsy Dupuis

Work Experience

February 2015 – Present

UI Developer

QSI / NextGen

Austin, TX

As a front-end developer with a designer perspective, I created resuable html/css components for a single-page application from new designs and while stabilizing legacy code.

Project: CSS Architecture

I architected the CSS for the single page application and refactored the existing application CSS for scale and resuablility.

Project: SVG Sprites for Icons

I designed and implemented a modular system for creating a consitent and scalable icons system using Grunt.
